name: Texas Throw 'Em
description:
Texas Throw 'Em is a 3rd person action adventure game based in the American Wild West! You play as Ace, a stage magician turned grand theft criminal. Through a series of small quests, Ace's goal is to gather as much money as possible in Gunflats before being forced to flee by the bounty hunter tracking him. Will you play it safe and leave or get greedy and risk it all for a couple extra dollars?

Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/HZ1Y7rGZmnRhjMgj9
